text: Marcus Lindblom (born February 7, 1995) is a Swedish ice hockey player currently playing with Strömsbro IF in the Hockeyettan (Div.1). His younger brother, Oskar is also a professional hockey player for the Philadelphia Flyers. Lindblom made his Swedish Hockey League debut playing with Brynäs IF during the 2014–15 SHL season. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Almtuna IS players Category:Brynäs IF players Category:Swedish ice hockey centres
title: Marcus Lindblom (ice hockey)
